name: Enuncia
description:
In Eununcia, you can be a god! Help the village during the day, and protect the village at night, using your voice and mouse!

Notice: this game uses voice recognition, so you may have to give permission to the use of your microphone.

Credits

Theotime Gigleux
Developer | https://generaldoptic.itch.io/
